Docs.param: The binary classification catalog trainer object.
The name of the label column.
The name of the feature column.
The name for the example weight column.
Advanced arguments to the algorithm.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using logistic regression trained with the trainer.

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.SgdStaticExtensions.StochasticGradientDescentClassificationTrainer (catalog, label, features, weights, maxIterations, initLearningRate, l2Weight, onFit)

Docs.param: The binary classification catalog trainer object.
The name of the label column.
The name of the feature column.
The name for the example weight column.
The maximum number of iterations; set to 1 to simulate online learning.
The initial learning rate used by SGD.
The L2 regularization constant.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using logistic regression trained with the trainer.

Docs.param: The binary classification catalog trainer object.
The name of the label column.
The name of the feature column.
The name for the example weight column.
The maximum number of iterations; set to 1 to simulate online learning.
The initial learning rate used by SGD.
The L2 regularization constant.
The loss function to use.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear classification model trained with the trainer.
